<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Corrosive Lizard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2009)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 45</row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=371), [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 30

**Immunities**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)

**Weaknesses**
good 3

**Gnashing Bite <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the corrosive lizard's jaws fails a check to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79)** **Effect** The lizard's jaws deal 1d6 piercing damage and 1d6 acid damage to the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d10+2 piercing plus 1d6 [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Gout of Acid** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The corrosive lizard vomits a gout of acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in this area takes 3d6 acid damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The lizard can't use Gout of Acid again for 1d4 rounds.

**Lurching Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The corrosive lizard Strides up to double its Speed and then makes a jaws Strike. If the lizard moved at least 20 feet away from its starting position, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this attack roll.

</column>
name: Corrosive Lizard
